backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, experiences, social data structures, and related CRUD operations with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented social features with associated files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human‑written summaries for numerous frontend files used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme provider and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthButtons: Renders login, signup, and logout buttons with Internet Identity integration.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireProf: Route guard ensuring users are authenticated and have a profile before accessing protected pages.
frontend/src/components/experiences/Crea: Renders a follow/unfollow button for a creator, handling authentication, self-check, and follow state mutations.
frontend/src/components/experiences/Expe: Displays an experience card with thumbnail, title, description, and creator info, navigating to the experience page on click.
Shows a responsive grid of ExperienceCard components with loading skeletons and empty-state messaging.
Provides thumbs-up and thumbs-down rating buttons for an experience, handling authentication and rating mutations.
frontend/src/components/experiences/InGa: Implements an in-game menu with leave, reset character, and settings dialogs using multiple modal components.
frontend/src/components/experiences/Publ: Dialog form for publishing a new experience, including fields, thumbnail upload with preview/progress, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, sidebar, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/LeftSideb: Sidebar navigation listing links to profile, social, inventory, groups, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying copyright text and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Top navigation bar with logo, desktop links, auth buttons, and a toggleable mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileH: Renders a user profile header card with avatar, name, and navigation buttons, showing loading or nothing when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/social/Following: Displays followed creators with loading states and allows unfollowing via mutations and profile lookups.
frontend/src/components/social/FriendsPa: Provides friend search, friend requests, pending request handling, and friend list management with related actions.
frontend/src/components/social/MessagesP: Implements a messaging UI allowing user search, selecting recipients, viewing messages, and sending new messages.
frontend/src/components/social/PartiesPa: Shows a placeholder panel for a future party system feature.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns authentication state, principal, and user role by querying the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useExperiences.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching, searching, creating, and rating experiences using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialFollowing.ts: Defines placeholder React Query hooks for following creators, with backend calls unimplemented and disabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialFriends.ts: Implements friend list, friend requests, and friend request actions using actor methods and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialMessages.ts: Provides message retrieval and sending hooks backed by actor methods and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialParties.ts: Contains a placeholder hook for party data retrieval with backend functionality not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDiscovery.ts: Adds a search hook that queries users by display name through the actor when a term is provided.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Implements hooks for fetching and updating user profiles, including signup and profile lookup by principal.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for themes, and global typography and layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React app root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarShop.tsx: Renders a UI page for an avatar shop with category cards and a coming-soon message.
frontend/src/pages/Create.tsx: Displays the creation tools overview page with gated login prompt and info cards for upcoming features.
frontend/src/pages/DiniBucks.tsx: Displays Dini Bucks info, showing balance or login prompt and feature cards describing earning and spending.
frontend/src/pages/Discover.tsx: Experience discovery page with search, trending by category, and publishing option for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/ExperienceDetails.tsx: Shows full details for an experience with play simulation, creator info, controls, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Groups.tsx: Static groups page displaying a placeholder when the user has not joined any groups.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home dashboard showing welcome card, recommended experiences, and friend activity placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/Inventory.tsx: Inventory page showing empty-state messaging for user items and collectibles.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: User profile page showing profile header and experiences authored by the logged‑in user.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page with placeholder content for account configuration options.
frontend/src/pages/SignUp.tsx: Sign-up page that handles Internet Identity login, profile creation, avatar upload with progress, and redirects if a profile already exists.
frontend/src/pages/Social.tsx: Social hub page showing friends, messages, parties, and following tabs, with authentication gating and navigation options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and layout settings, and enabling typography, container queries, and animations plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing existing social features, pending backend feature requests, and current project state version.
